attributes.action: Ban Cameron from Nelson Mandelas state funeral
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the sad loss of Nelson Mandela,  we the British people don't feel that it is appropriate in light of the pure and hutter contempt and hypocrisy David Cameron and the Tory party have shown in previous years against Nelson Mandelas struggles for justice and equality and as such feel that David Cameron does not represent the views and feelings of the majority of the British people during this sad time.

We demand David Cameron does not attend the state funeral of Nelson Mandela on behalf of the British people.

Many thanks WeDemand.uk
